title: Frieze New York
seo_description: The Frieze New York Art Fair on Randall's Island in NYC.
preview: One of the largest art fairs in New York City, Frieze New York brings over 200 contemporary art galleries from around the world to Randall’s Island Park in the East River.
contents:
One of the largest art fairs in New York City, Frieze New York brings over 200 contemporary art galleries from around the world to Randall’s Island Park in the East River. The galleries represent both emerging and established artists who are at the cutting edge of contemporary art. The four day festival also includes panel discussions, keynote lectures, a new “Reading Room” of the world’s best arts books, and food from local favorites Frankies Spuntino, Roberta’s Pizza, El Rey and Cosme.

Photograph by Marco Scozzaro, courtesy of Marco Scozzaro/Frieze.


For more information, visit the Frieze New York website.
